title: Can't save ConfCons.xml
author: TScalzott
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
With 1.76 Alpha and imported connections from RDMan, save of ConfCons fails, leaving a zero-byte file behind.  That in turn throws an exception at next mRemoteNG launch.

## Expected Behavior
Connection file should get saved :-)

## Current Behavior
Error writing ConfCons.xml due to an null value inside, which is not identified.
Log snippet:

2018-07-11 08:45:38,005 [1] ERROR - SaveToXml failed
Value cannot be null.
...

iterations.description: Serialization failure (System.ArgumentNullException) causes XmlConnectionsSaver to write an empty file, leading to data loss. Triggered by null properties in ConnectionInfo (likely from RDMan import or specific settings).

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Serialization failure (System.ArgumentNullException) causes XmlConnectionsSaver to write an empty file, leading to data loss. Triggered by null properties in ConnectionInfo (likely from RDMan import or specific settings).
Approach: 1. Update XmlConnectionsSaver to validate that the serialized XML string is not empty before writing to disk. 2. Update XmlConnectionNodeSerializer28 (and older versions if needed) to null-coalesce all string properties (e.g., PuttySession ?? "") to prevent ArgumentNullException.
